statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then current=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); size=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.context_window_size'); pct=$((current * 100 / size)); filled=$((pct * 20 / 100)); empty=$((20 - filled)); filled_bar=$(printf '%*s' "$filled" ''); empty_bar=$(printf '%*s' "$empty" ''); printf '%s | Context: \033[48;5;250m%s\033[48;5;239m%s\033[0m %d%%' "$model" "$filled_bar" "$empty_bar" "$pct"; else printf '%s | Context: N/A' "$model"; fi
